about_the_game:
Synopsis

The Deep Space 7 Space Research Institute, located adjacent to Mars, is facing an unprecedented disaster. Due to a sudden leak accident, the entire space station was plunged into chaos and crisis. In the space station filled with monsters,
Aya, as a staff member of the space station, faced numerous dangers and embarked on a journey of escape.

Game content

This is a third person action game that mainly includes shooting, puzzle solving, and other elements. At the same time, the game's supplies are also very limited, and players need to manage resources. The game has a terrifying and tense atmosphere, dark channels, flashing lights, and a variety of different weapons to use. Weapons can be upgraded, and the protagonist can unlock multiple sets of clothing. There are various puzzles and interactive objects, different attack methods of zombie monsters, and a prop system that can be combined. It includes main storyline levels, and future plans will also add different challenge cards

Development team

This is my first single player game that I have personally developed, and the game is still under development. Feel free to provide suggestions, and the game will continue to be updated!

Adult content description

The game has violent elements, including amputations and head attacks on monsters. Please note this
